utility functions for Reactome data-fetch, mappings, and overlay networks

reactome2py.utils.ehld_stids()¶

retrieves a list of high-level hierarchy pathway with Enhanced High Level Diagrams (EHLD) https://reactome.org/icon-info/ehld-specs-guideline :return: list of pathway stIds

reactome2py.utils.gene_mappings()¶

Maps reactome pathway stId and name to it’s associated gene list (HGNC) :return: dictionary of reactome pathways and HGNC gene mappings to the pathway.

reactome2py.utils.sbgn_stids()¶

retieves a list of lower-level (with hierarchy) pathways that have SBGNs https://reactome.org/about/news/110-sbgn-files-revamp :return: list of pathway stIds

reactome2py
